# Javascript and classes

## OOP - Object Oriented Programming
## Object 
- collection of properties and methods.
- toLowerCase
## Why use OOP?
## Parts of OOP 
- Object literal {}
- Constructor function
- Prototypes
- Instances (new, this)
## 4 Pillars
- Abstraction (hiding details) 
- Encapsulation (wrap up data)
- Inheritance ()
- Polymorphism (Many roop)
